episodes.name: We is Us
episodes.overview: An astronomer's discovery turns the planet upside down. Carol Sturka, a curmudgeonly novelist, is terrified by this strange new world.

episodes.name: Pirate Lady
episodes.overview: A curiously familiar face introduces Carol to the bizarre new normal. A gathering in Europe brings strangers together… and causes friction.

episodes.name: Grenade
episodes.overview: The World just wants to help—which infuriates Carol. A heart-to-heart conversation ends with a bang.

episodes.name: Please, Carol
episodes.overview: Carol tests the boundaries of this weirdly honest world at the expense of her ego. Far away, a resolute individual learns he's not alone.

episodes.name: Got Milk
episodes.overview: Carol doubles down on her investigation—loneliness be damned. Meanwhile, howls in the night reveal a new source of danger.

episodes.name: HDP
episodes.overview: Carol shares a horrific discovery and learns new truths in the process. Mr. Diabaté lives life to the fullest in Sin City.

episodes.name: The Gap
episodes.overview: Manousos begins a dangerous trek to meet Carol. Returning home from Las Vegas, Carol gets creative with her rebellion.

episodes.name: Charm Offensive
episodes.overview: Carol takes a different tack with The Others and discovers more than she anticipated. Manousos awakens in unfamiliar surroundings.

episodes.name: La Chica o El Mundo
episodes.overview: Manousos arrives in Albuquerque and complications ensue. Carol visits the last best place on Earth.
